모던 홈 오피스(효율적인 작업 공간).prompt: modern home office with ergonomic furniture, technology integration, organized workspace, productive environment, contemporary design, functional storage solutions

계곡 바위(물에 다듬어진 자연의 조각).prompt: river valley rocks with smooth water-polished stones, flowing stream, natural geological formations, filtered forest light

밤하늘 별빛(우주의 신비).prompt: night sky with brilliant stars, moonlight illumination, silhouetted landscape elements, cosmic atmosphere, natural darkness
